name: Telephone Operator Game
description:
Part of the 5 day Virtual Ventures Game Jam Next event.

Play as a telephone operator: Connect the right plugs to the right port according to instructions. Full screen highly recommended.

Team

Maya - Artist

Lee - Artist

Max - Developer
